articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Measles outbreak erupts in one of Texas’ least vaccinated counties - Ars Technica
articles.description: 9 cases are confirmed and 3 are probable. Officials says more are likely to come.

articles.author: Elena Schneider
articles.title: Hakeem Jeffries met privately with Silicon Valley donors in bid to ‘mend fences.’ - POLITICO
articles.description: The meeting comes as the tech world has lurched rightward in the second Donald Trump era.
articles.content: In Northern California, Jeffries and Rep. Sam Liccardo, the freshman Democrat who represents part of Silicon Valley, were working to stem further defections and to rally Democratic-leaning donors to … [+5242 chars]
